channel.title: Server Keeps Freezing
channel.description:
Ok well ages ago i used the HomieScape source to code, and now ( for a couple of weeks ) Ive been looking for sources to use. I Can host them etc, people can login [b]but every source i have tried keeps freezing[/b], it cant be an anti leach because i know some of the people that created the sources.
This happens with various sources, ive tried over 30 now. My conclusion now is that it is my computer, even though it is pretty fast.
If anyone is able to fix this, i will give them a lv81 Rs Account, decent stats etc.
Contact me on msn: Connormarcus@hotmail.co.uk
Thanks :D
EDIT: The old sources i used to use never lagged or froze.

item.title: Server Keeps Freezing
item.dc:creator: @Epicskillz Epicskillz
item.description:
@Epicskillz wrote:

deathschaos9:

Right click my computer, click properties, it should tell you there.

Lol, i’ve already tried but it didnt say…?

Read full topic

item.title: Server Keeps Freezing
item.dc:creator: @Epicskillz Epicskillz
item.description:
@Epicskillz wrote:

deathschaos9:

It’s probably your Java, do you have a 64-bit OS? If so do you have 64-bit Java installed?

Ive talked about this with you on msn before LOL, Erm how do i find out? :l

Read full topic
